Address: 2801 EAST BELTLINE NE, GRAND RAPIDS, Michigan, 49525, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Universal Forest Products, Inc. (now known as UFP Industries) is a holding company with subsidiaries throughout North America, Europe, Asia, and Australia that supply wood, wood composite and other products to three markets: retail, industrial, and construction. The Company is headquartered in Grand Rapids, Michigan. For more information about Universal Forest Products, Inc., or its affiliated operations, go to www.ufpi.com. Information relating to current developments in our business is incorporated by reference from our Annual Report to Shareholders for the fiscal year ended December 28, 2019 ("2019 Annual Report") under the caption "Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations." Selected portions of the 2019 Annual Report are filed as Exhibit 13 with this Form 10-K Report. Financial Information About Segments.  ... More ...
